verses.verse: The <S%G2532><s%> During <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Accomplishing Of <S%G4845><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Pentecost <S%G4005><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> All <S%G537><s%> With One Accord <S%G3661><s%> In The <S%G1909><s%> Same <S%G3588><s%> Place. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> Suddenly <S%G869><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> A Sound <S%G2279><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> Rushing <S%G5342><s%> Of A Breath <S%G4157><s%> Violent, <S%G972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Filled <S%G4137><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Sitting. <S%G2521><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Appeared <S%G3700><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Divided <S%G1266><s%> Tongues <S%G1100><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> Of Fire, <S%G4442><s%> <S%G2523><s%> And Sat <S%G5037><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Filled <S%G4130><s%> All <S%G537><s%> With The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> With Other <S%G2087><s%> Tongues, <S%G1100><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> To Utter Forth. <S%G669><s%>

Now <S%G2258><s%> Were <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> Dwelling <S%G2730><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Pious <S%G2126><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> But Having Arisen <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rumour <S%G5456><s%> Of This, <S%G3778><s%> Came Together <S%G4905><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Confounded, <S%G4797><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> Language <S%G1258><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1839><s%> And Were Amazed <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> , Lo <S%G2400><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Galileans? <S%G1057><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G2398><s%> Language <S%G1258><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Were Born, <S%G1080><s%>

Parthians <S%G3934><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Medes <S%G3370><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Elamites, <S%G1639><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Inhabit <S%G2730><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mesopotamia, <S%G3318><s%> <S%G2449><s%> And Judea <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cappadocia, <S%G2587><s%> Pontus <S%G4195><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%>

<S%G5435><s%> Both Phrygia <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pamphylia, <S%G3828><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parts <S%G3313><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Libya <S%G3033><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> About <S%G2596><s%> Cyrene, <S%G2957><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sojourning Here <S%G1927><s%> Romans, <S%G4514><s%> <S%G2453><s%> Both Jews <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Proselytes, <S%G4339><s%>

Cretans <S%G2912><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Arabians, <S%G690><s%> We Hear <S%G191><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In Our <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G2251><s%> Tongues <S%G1100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great Things <S%G3167><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God? <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1839><s%> And Were Amazed <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were In Perplexity, <S%G1280><s%> One <S%G243><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What <S%G302><s%> Would <S%G2309><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Be? <S%G1511><s%>
<S%G2087><s%> But Others <S%G1161><s%> Mocking <S%G5512><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Said, <S%G3754><s%> Of New Wine <S%G1098><s%> Full <S%G3325><s%> They Are. <S%G1526><s%>

But Standing <S%G2476><s%> Up <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eleven <S%G1733><s%> Lifted Up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spoke Forth <S%G669><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Who <S%G3588><s%> Inhabit <S%G2730><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> , All, <S%G537><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Known <S%G1110><s%> Let Be, <S%G2077><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give Heed To <S%G1801><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> My : <S%G3450><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Take It, <S%G5274><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are Drunken, <S%G3184><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> The Hour <S%G5610><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Day; <S%G2250><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Spoken <S%G2046><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Joel, <S%G2493><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Days, <S%G2250><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> I Will Pour Out <S%G1632><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Flesh; <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Prophesy <S%G4395><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Daughters <S%G2364><s%> Your; <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Young Men <S%G3495><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Visions <S%G3706><s%> Shall See, <S%G3700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Dreams <S%G1798><s%> Shall Dream; <S%G1797><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Even <S%G1065><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bondwomen <S%G1399><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> Will I Pour Out <S%G1632><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Shall Prophesy; <S%G4395><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Above <S%G507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Below, <S%G2736><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Vapour <S%G822><s%> Of Smoke. <S%G2586><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> Shall Be Turned <S%G3344><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Moon <S%G4582><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> <S%G4250><s%> Before <S%G2228><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Manifest. <S%G2016><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Shall Be, <S%G2071><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Call Upon <S%G1941><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Shall Be Saved. <S%G4982><s%>

Men <S%G435><s%> Israelites, <S%G2475><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> These <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Words : <S%G5128><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nazarene, <S%G3480><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> By <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Set Forth <S%G584><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> By Works Of Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Signs, <S%G4592><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Wrought <S%G4160><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Yourselves <S%G846><s%> Know : <S%G1492><s%>

Him, <S%G5126><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Determinate <S%G3724><s%> Counsel <S%G1012><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Given Up, <S%G1560><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Lawless, <S%G459><s%> Having Crucified <S%G4362><s%> Ye Put To Death. <S%G337><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Raised Up, <S%G450><s%> Having Loosed <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throes <S%G5604><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Death, <S%G2288><s%> Inasmuch As <S%G2530><s%> It Was <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G2258><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> For To Be Held <S%G2902><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> It; <S%G846><s%>

David <S%G1138><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> I Foresaw <S%G4308><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3450><s%> Me <S%G1223><s%> Continually, <S%G3956><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> At <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> He Is, <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May <S%G3361><s%> Not Be Shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

<S%G1223><s%> Therefore <S%G5124><s%> Rejoiced <S%G2165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exulted <S%G21><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tongue; <S%G1100><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Yea <S%G2089><s%> More, <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Shall Rest <S%G2681><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Hope, <S%G1680><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Thou Wilt Leave <S%G1459><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> , Hades, <S%G86><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Wilt Thou Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy One <S%G3741><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Corruption. <S%G1312><s%>

Thou Didst Make Known <S%G1107><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Paths <S%G3598><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> Thou Wilt Fill <S%G4137><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> With Joy <S%G2167><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Thy Continence. <S%G4675><s%>

Men <S%G435><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> It Is Permitted <S%G1832><s%> Me To Speak <S%G2036><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Freedom <S%G3954><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Patriarch <S%G3966><s%> David, <S%G1138><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> He Died <S%G5053><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Buried, <S%G2290><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tomb <S%G3418><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Amongst <S%G1722><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Unto <S%G891><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> This Day. <S%G3778><s%>

A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> With An Oath <S%G3727><s%> Swore <S%G3660><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Loins <S%G3751><s%> His <S%G846><s%> As <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> To Raise Up <S%G450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To Sit <S%G2523><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Throne, <S%G2362><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

Foreseeing <S%G4275><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Left <S%G2641><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> His <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> , Hades, <S%G86><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Corruption. <S%G1312><s%>

This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Raised Up <S%G450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Whereof <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> Witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

By The <S%G3588><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Having Been Exalted, <S%G5312><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G5037><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> He Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Behold <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hear. <S%G191><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> Ascended <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> <S%G3004><s%> But He Says <S%G1161><s%> Himself, <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> At <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand, <S%G1188><s%> My <S%G3450><s%>
Until <S%G2193><s%> I 302 PRT Place 5087 V-2AAS-1S Thine 3588 T-APM 2190 A-APM Enemies 4675 P-2GS A Footstool 5286 N-ASN 3588 T-GPM 4228 N-GPM Of Thy Feet. 4675 P-2GS

Assuredly <S%G806><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Let Know <S%G1097><s%> All The <S%G3956><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> You <S%G5210><s%> Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>
